article_title: Election 2016: Mayfield wants re-election to support Bevin’s ‛new direction’ for Kentucky

article_metadata.author: Bill Robinson/ brobinson@richmondregister.com

og.description: Rep. Donna Mayfield, R-Winchester, is seeking her fourth term representing the House of Representatives’ 73rd District. It includes five precincts in northeastern Madison County, plus all of Clark County.
og.title: Election 2016: Mayfield wants re-election to support Bevin’s ‛new direction’ for Kentucky
